content.raw:
I did a fresh install today using docker and get the same issue. After installing ros ign bridge 

`git clone https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign.git`

 I am NOT able to run

`ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4`

only

`ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4`

also if I run X3 or X4 with teleop.launch I am not able to move them around. Seems like they receive 0 throttle no mater what.
content.html:
I did a fresh install today using docker and get the same issue. After installing ros ign bridge

git clone https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign.git

I am NOT able to run

ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4

only

ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4

also if I run X3 or X4 with teleop.launch I am not able to move them around. Seems like they receive 0 throttle no mater what.
